account.name: Jeffs Mail
account.disclaimerShort: Simulated mailbox UI for navigating publicly released documents. Not a real private inbox. Adults 21+ only.

items.subject: Release notice: court filing added to archive
items.snippet: A new filing has been added to the public document archive for review and discussion.
items.bodyText:
This is a simulated inbox entry used to organize publicly released documents.

An updated court filing has been added to the archive. Use the attachment below to open the source PDF.

Reminder: This UI is an organizational interface and does not claim to display an authentic private email account.

items.subject: Index update: additional pages available
items.snippet: The index has been updated with additional pages and labels for easier browsing.
items.bodyText:
This entry is a simulated message used to improve browsing.

The archive index was updated to include clearer labels, improved sorting, and more consistent filenames.

If a PDF fails to open in the Facebook in-app browser, use the menu to open in Chrome/Safari.

items.subject: Request: group filings by date and case caption
items.snippet: It would be helpful to group filings by date and caption so readers can follow timelines.
items.bodyText:
Simulated sent message.

Suggestion: group filings by date and case caption so readers can browse chronologically and understand context.

Also: add keyword tags (motion, declaration, transcript) for faster searching.

items.subject: Starred: notable exhibit referenced in filing
items.snippet: A referenced exhibit is available in the archive; review the source PDF for context.
items.bodyText:
This is a simulated starred entry.

A notable exhibit is referenced in a public filing. Use the attachment to open the source PDF and review the exhibit in full context.

Reminder: allegations in documents should be read with caution and in context.

items.subject: Attachments queue: newly added PDFs
items.snippet: New PDFs were added to the attachments queue for quick access.
items.bodyText:
This mailbox view highlights messages that include attachments.

Open the PDF attachments below to view the source documents.
